modName: WTF Shout - Unrelenting Force on self - ragdoll push and fart
summary:
Dovahkiin ate too many beans...
Unrelenting Force on self
Fart and fly!
New shout (nothing is replaced)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#008800][b]Adds new shout - "Unrelenting Force on self".[/b][/color][/size]

Just for Fun.Â Fart and fly! Use for fast travelling :)
This shout throws the player in the cursor direction.
Force depends on time of holding of the "use power" button.
It is new shout (nothing is replaced ).

You can adjust force of a throw via the console.
Console command:
"set zshpushpower to 10 "
(10-number by default)
The more value - the more initial speed.
At input of negative numbers the player will fly back.

[color=#008800][b]How is it works:[/b][/color]

Depending on a cursor position components of a vector of force on X Y Z axes are calculated.
Force is proportional to coefficient "zshpushpower".
For the period of flight the script does the player invulnerable that he didn't die when falling :).
I consider that time in flight = time between two events:
1)Player cast shout
2)Player plays GetUp animation.
So it is possible to jump (cast W T F shout) off from the Throat of the World and to remain live.

You can force down characters if during flight will strike them. :)
Unfortunately this function not always works, as at great speed flight it is impossible to process an event.

(Script sources included)

[color=#008800][b]Installation:[/b][/color]

Unpack and copy the contents of the compressed ZIP file into your Skyrim game folder, into the 'Data' folder. Using the 'vanilla game launcher' tool, click on the 'Data' button and make sure there is a check mark in front of this mod. This will activate the mod in your game. Now load the game up and your now done.
The player can use the new shout after escaping from Helgen (it appears automatically.)
If you have an older version, I recommend to do the following:
- From the vanilla game start menu, disable the mod.
- Start your game up and load your save game.
- Save your game. This is now your 'cleaned' save game. Exit the game.
- Install the new version.
- Enable the mod again using the vanilla game launcher tool.
- Load up the game and load your last save game.

[b][color=#008800]troubleshooting[/color][/b]

1)If the player freezes animations (for example, when a player flies into the cave.), Wait about 30 seconds to fix. (ver. 1.04)

[color=#008800][b]Endorse me if You like my work![/b][/color]
[color=#008800]Thanks![/color]
[color=#008800]Please credit me for all my files you use.[/color]
author: ShooD

files.name: Source 1_04
files.changelogHtml:
Sond fix for Argonian and Khajiit females.
Added a timer that resets the animation of the player after about 30 seconds after hanging. (For example, when a player flies into the cave.)
